list.name: Changes
list.comment: 0.2.3 Added categoryParentId in Category. Added address field to User.

task.summary: 0.0.1 Created basic representation of database. Created some test controllers and services.
0.0.2 Updated database a bit. Implemented liquibase in project. Described all db in yaml files.
0.0.3 Reworked relations in db, made them bidirectional instead of unidirectional. Started implementing GraphQl in project. Created GraphQl types for all classes.

0.0.4 Started implementing jwt authorization with Spring security. Inserted jwt filter in FilterChain. Added JwtUtils for operations with jwt token. Fixed some tables and graphql types. Renamed user_status to user_role. Fixed graphql always forbidden via csrf disable.

0.0.5 Implemented Jwt authorization. Created DTOs for authorization requests and responses. Created AuthenticationController for registration and authentication. Renamed for more meaning JwtUtils -> JwtService, JwtFilter -> JwtAuthenticationFilter. Slightly changed users table.

0.1.0 Added graphql mutations for adding products and brands and register user. Replaced REST controller for authentication with graphql. Created controllers based on graphql for Brand and Product. Created business logic for registration and authentication of user, adding product(figured out how to save incoming Json from graphql), adding brand.
0.1.1 Fixed AuthenticationController. Fixed name differences in graphql query and mutation with java classes.
1.0.0 Fully functional version of app. Fixed graphql cors error.

0.2.0 Created new mutations for ProductVariation, VariationDetails. Created new queries for Country, ProductVariation, VariationDetails. Added description field to Product. Changed amount field in ProductVariation to float type. Slightly changed OrderDetails and BasketDetails. Created new DTOs for mutations.

0.2.1 Deleted Basket and BasketDetails from the project. Slightly changed adding a Product. Fixed graphql Product with adding new fields. Added new method for ImageService. Replaced in User username with email, added phone, isEmailVerified and birthday fields.

0.2.2 Added MailController for sending mails. Added VerificationController for verifying user email. Added CryptoTool for encoding and decoding user id in mail verification. Fixed in users table columns phoneNumber and email with unique constrain. Added Date type in GraphQlConfig. Added DateTimeFormatter in AuthenticationServiceImpl. Fixed graphql order_details.
